original_title: Trump hails Texas redistricting as 'big win' for GOP party nationwide | Fox News
article_summary: Texas Governor Greg Abbott discusses a redistricting plan that adds up to five new GOP-leaning congressional seats, which President Donald Trump calls a "Big WIN" for Republicans. Trump urges other Republican-led states to follow Texas's lead, claiming it will lead to less crime, a strong economy, and a stronger Second Amendment. The plan, however, faces opposition from Democrats who argue it dilutes minority voting power and is racially discriminatory.</s>
